welcome_benefits: 500 EDGE Miles on the First Transaction Within 30 Days of Card Issuance

Movie & Dining: 30% Instant Discount on Zomato. 25% Discount on Dining Via Eazydiner (Upto ₹800)
Rewards Rate: 6X EDGE Miles/₹150 at IndianOil Outlets. 2X EDGE Miles/₹150 on Grocery Spends. 1X EDGE Miles on All Other Eligible Spends
Reward Redemption: EDGE Miles Can Be Redeemed for Fuel (1 EDGE Mile = ₹1). These Can Also Be Converted to Partner Points (1:1)

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹1 Lakh or More

product_details: The IndianOil Axis Premium Credit Card is most suited for fuel expenses.
This card offers spend-based airport lounge access.
You can avail of a 30% discount on food orders with Zomato.
Apart from fuel, this card also offers accelerated 2X EDGE Miles for grocery spends.
